message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of the $8,000 we're asking for. This investment will undoubtedly provide significant returns and benefits for you in the long run. Considering its worth to both of us, I kindly request you to accept this offer and make the payment within the next 24 hours to secure your exclusive access to the product. Should you have any questions or need further clarification, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
